about_the_game:
Dive into the adrenaline-pumping world of Inhibit, an exhilarating high-speed platform game that will push your reflexes to the limit! Embark on an exciting journey through meticulously designed obstacle courses, each more challenging than the last.

  • Precise Parkour
    Leap and progress with perfect precision through intricate platform layouts.
    You'll experience a demanding progression in 10 levels, each tougher than the previous one and constantly moving upwards. Be aware that in this challenging process, if you die on a level, you'll respawn at the beginning of that level.
    The slightest misstep could mean the difference between victory and defeat

  • Magnetic Fireball:
    Harness the power of fire with blazing projectiles that freeze obstacles in their tracks.
    To overcome massive obstacles, including robotic enemies and giant retractable fans, you'll need to strategically utilize these limited fireballs.

  • Challenging Obstacle:
    You will encounter robots that push you away with their projectiles and large fans that pull you towards them.

  • Become the Ultimate Speedrunner:
    Challenge yourself to become the best speedrunner in Inhibit!
    Enhance your reflexes, conquer intricate obstacle courses, and master the art of combining speed with precision.
    Will you rise to the top and achieve excellence in high-speed running?


    We're introducing Inhibit with its 1st stage consisting of 10 levels. After this stage, we need your feedback. We plan to bring the 2nd and 3rd stages with updates. Please don't hesitate to tell us what you don't like about the game because we need this feedback. Also, don't forget to mention what you like about it. This way, together with you, we can make this game even better. We'd like to thank everyone in advance who will play this game.
detailed_description:
Dive into the adrenaline-pumping world of Inhibit, an exhilarating high-speed platform game that will push your reflexes to the limit! Embark on an exciting journey through meticulously designed obstacle courses, each more challenging than the last.

  • Precise Parkour
    Leap and progress with perfect precision through intricate platform layouts.
    You'll experience a demanding progression in 10 levels, each tougher than the previous one and constantly moving upwards. Be aware that in this challenging process, if you die on a level, you'll respawn at the beginning of that level.
    The slightest misstep could mean the difference between victory and defeat

  • Magnetic Fireball:
    Harness the power of fire with blazing projectiles that freeze obstacles in their tracks.
    To overcome massive obstacles, including robotic enemies and giant retractable fans, you'll need to strategically utilize these limited fireballs.

  • Challenging Obstacle:
    You will encounter robots that push you away with their projectiles and large fans that pull you towards them.

  • Become the Ultimate Speedrunner:
    Challenge yourself to become the best speedrunner in Inhibit!
    Enhance your reflexes, conquer intricate obstacle courses, and master the art of combining speed with precision.
    Will you rise to the top and achieve excellence in high-speed running?


    We're introducing Inhibit with its 1st stage consisting of 10 levels. After this stage, we need your feedback. We plan to bring the 2nd and 3rd stages with updates. Please don't hesitate to tell us what you don't like about the game because we need this feedback. Also, don't forget to mention what you like about it. This way, together with you, we can make this game even better. We'd like to thank everyone in advance who will play this game.
name: Inhibit

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista or Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 and above
  • Processor: Desktop Intel Core 2 Duo at 2 GHz, or AMD Athlon 64 X2 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) UHD Graphics 630
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 and above
  • Processor: Intel i5 quad core at 3 GHz, AMD FX-6200 3.8 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 with 1 Go RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: "Inhibit" is an exhilarating and highly challenging speed run platform game that will put your reflexes to the ultimate test.Each level is more demanding than the previous one, and the slightest mistake will determine the difference between victory and defeat.
